kpi_info.title: RB SETUP ATTEMPT FOR DC-HSDPA
kpi_info.use: The number of attempted Radio Bearer setups/reconfigurations for DC-HSDPA. Includes initial DC-HSDPA allocations, reconfigurations from SC-HSDPA to DC-HSDPA, hard handovers and serving cell changes. Also M1006C149 is updated along with this counter if the radio bearer was not using HSDPA previously. UPDATED: When the RNC sends RRC: RADIO BEARER SETUP, RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION, RRC: PHYSICAL CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION or RRC: TRANSPORT CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION to the UE with information to configure the radio bearer to use DC-HSDPA
